list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: drive or force (a liquid, especially a drug or vaccine) into a person or animal's body with a syringe or similar device.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the doctor injected a painkilling drug
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bác sĩ tiêm thuốc giảm đau

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: introduce (something) into a passage, cavity, or solid material under pressure.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: inject the foam and allow it to expand
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tiêm bọt và cho phép nó mở rộng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: introduce (a new or different element) into something, especially as a boost or interruption.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she tried to inject scorn into her tone
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô cố tiêm khinh miệt vào giọng điệu của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: place (a spacecraft or other object) into an orbit or trajectory.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: many meteoroids are injected into hyperbolic orbits
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nhiều thiên thạch được tiêm vào quỹ đạo Hyperbolic
